column4: my entire gnome session hangs, I changed some panels around last night, now it wont start up
you can restart your panel by: sudo killall gnome-panel
and then start it again by running: gnome-panel
yes, but that wont fix it
or reconfigure (losing al changes) sudo dpkg -reconfigure gnome-panel
hmm that might work, what will I loose?
no only the panel (menubars) so the changes you made to your menu's and applets etc.
no, but it says its not a valid option?
there is no space between dpkg and -reconfigure
